name: A Demonic Presence
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: An opponent chooses one: Your hero heals 2 damage from itself; or your hero deals 2 shadow damage to that opponent's hero. If you control a Demon ally, he must choose both.
"The possible repercussions of Karazhan falling into the wrong hands are unthinkable." - Archmage Alturus

name: Aegwynn, Guardian of Tirisfal
effect:
When your hero becomes Aegwynn, add three tirisfal counters to her.

, Remove a tirisfal counter → Target ally has Elusive this turn.
, Remove a tirisfal counter → Draw a card, then discard a card.

While Aegwynn has no tirisfal counters on her: → Put a token copy of each ally you control into play.

name: Ancient Moonkin Form
effect:
Ongoing: If your hero would deal or heal damage, it deals or heals that much +1 instead.

While you control five or more Ongoing abilities:
→ Draw a card.
"The moonkin are favored by Elune, and I intend to show you why." - Enabrin, Timewalker Druid

name: Arcane Anomaly
effect: This ally has +1 ATK for each card in your hand.
These sentient collections of stray magical energy skulk in the halls of Karazhan.

name: Arcane Protector
effect:
Monster Hero Required

Protector
Activated by Medivh to guard the secrets of Karazhan decades ago, they follow their orders even now.

name: Arcane Shock
effect: Your hero deals 2 arcane damage to target opposing ally. An ally dealt damage this way loses and can't have powers this turn.
"He flew 50 feet after impact. I think that's a new record for me." - Bianca, Timewalker Mage

name: Archdruid Fandral Staghelm
effect:
Elusive

→ Target ally has Absorb, Ferocity, Sentinel, and Stealth this turn.
"I want nothing to do with Silithus, the Qiraji, and least of all, any damned dragons!"

name: Assault on Blackrock Spire
effect:
If you control three or more allies: Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
Assuming the worst, Admiral Proudmore and King Terenas agree that it falls upon you to stage a final siege upon Blackrock Spire.

name: Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian
effect:
At the start of your turn, remove the top card of your deck from the game.

→ For each ally removed this way, put a 1 / 1 Raven Spirit ally token into play. For each ability removed this way, your hero heals 1 damage from target hero or ally. For each equipment removed this way, your hero deals 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero.

(12), Destroy Atiesh → You may play any number of cards removed this way without paying their costs.
The legendary staff of Medivh, Guardian of Tirisfal.

name: Bastion of Defense
effect:
Protection Talent

Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +4 / +4, Protector, and "At the end of your turn, you may ready this ally."

name: Belthira the Black Thorn
effect:
Elusive, Haste 3, Stealth

When this ally deals combat damage to a hero, remove the top card of that hero's controller's deck from the game. Then, search his deck, graveyard, and hand for all cards with that name and remove them from the game.

name: Bianca, Timewalker Mage
effect: While you control two or more allies that share a or race: → Target ally can't attack or exhaust this turn.
"Stay frosty, friend."

name: Bigbelly, Furbolg Chieftain
effect: This ally has +1 / +1 for each card in all graveyards.
His magic is as powerful as his appetite.

name: Bitey
effect: Smash
"Cuddly" was taken.

name: Blackfang Tarantula
effect:
Monster Hero Required

Elusive

Stealth
Eight legs, no mercy.

name: Blackrock Spire
effect: Bloodrush: While an opposing hero has more damage on it than your hero: (2), → Put a 2 / 2 Orc Warrior ally token into play with Ferocity and "This ally can attack only heroes."
Once home to the Dark Iron dwarves, the mountain became the base of operations for Doomhammer's Horde.

name: Blessing of the Pure
effect:
Attach to target ally you control.

Ongoing: When this ability enters play, you may destroy target ability.

Attached ally has +2 / +2.
"Grant me purity of body and soul."

name: Blood Knight Lynesta
effect:
Absorb

This ally has +3 / +4 while an opponent controls an or Monster hero.
"Your fate is out of my hands."

name: Bloodfire Greatstaff
effect: (3), → Exhaust target ally.
Signs point to it being an orcish relic, discarded when Gul'dan's army came through the Dark Portal.

name: Bone Shield
effect:
Blood Talent

Ongoing: (1), , Remove an ally in an opposing graveyard from the game → Add a bone counter to this ability.

Weapons you control have +1 ATK and armor you control have +1 for each bone counter on this ability.
"Macabre, but effective." - Darris Leafshade

name: Brutal Steel
effect:
Attach to target weapon.

Ongoing: Attached weapon has +10 ATK.
"I'm not going to lie - this isn't going to end well for you."

name: Capital City, Lordaeron
effect:
Unity: While you control three or more Human allies:
(1), → Put a 1 / 1 Human Warrior ally token into play with Protector.
The Capital City of Lordaeron was the bastion of humanity throughout the Second War.

name: Chora Cloudspeaker
effect: Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, allies you control have +1 ATK this turn.
"Stormclouds! Bless us with your fury!"

name: Cloudburst
effect: Your hero heals 4 damage from each hero and ally you control. Put up to one card from your graveyard into your hand for each character healed for 1 or more damage this way. Remove this card from the game.

name: Corruption of the Ages
effect:
Rift

Your hero deals 5 shadow damage to target hero and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.
"I can feel the evil of Gorefiend's knights permeating this entire area." - Enabrin, Timewalker Druid

name: Critical Mass
effect:
Fire Talent

Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal two cards with the same cost. Your hero deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally for each card revealed this way. Then shuffle those revealed cards in your deck.

name: Crusade of Kings
effect:
This ability enters play with X crusade counters.

Ongoing: Allies with cost equal to the number of crusade counters on this ability have +1 / +1 for each crusade counter.
"Through the Holy Light, we are unstoppable."

name: Curse of the Fel
effect:
Attach to target opposing hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached hero. Then, if attached hero has 15 or more damage on it, destroy this ability. If you do, put a 5 / 5 Felguard Demon Monster ally token into play with Ferocity.
"Nothing important ever got done without a little bloodshed." - Myro Lumastis

name: Danath Trollbane
effect:
Protector

When Danath deals damage, put a 1 / 1 Human Warrior ally token into play with Protector.
"Go in expecting trouble, and you'll be more likely to survive. And then you can call yourselves Sons of Lothar."

name: Dark Deliverance
effect: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target ally. If an ally is dealt fatal damage this way, your hero heals 3 damage from itself.
"Allow me to ease my pain."

name: Dark Portal Hearthstone
effect: → Put target ally you control into its owner's hand.
A small keepsake in the shape of the Dark Portal. Perhaps a bit of the portal's magic inhabits the charm, too.
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

name: Darkwater Crocolisk
effect: "Should you spy a mossy log / afloat in swamp, morass or bog / toss a stone or take the risk / for it may be a crocolisk." - Human nursery rhyme

name: Darris Leafshade
effect:
Haste 2

Once per turn: (2) → Allies you control have +2 ATK this turn.
"Once I bathed in the light of Elune; now blood alone gives me solace."

name: Demonic Rebirth
effect:
Demonology Talent

Ongoing: When a Demon enters play under your control, add a nether counter to this ability.

, Destroy this ability → Put target Demon ally with cost less than or equal to the number of nether counters on this ability from your graveyard into play.

name: Despair
effect: When your hero deals combat damage with this weapon to a hero, its controller reveals the top three cards of his deck. Add a +1 ATK counter to this weapon for each revealed ally, then put all revealed cards into their owner's graveyard.
Is it the symptom, or the cause?

name: Dohna Darksky
effect: Other Tauren allies you control have +2 .
"To truly understand An'she, you must understand the shadow he casts."

name: Don Carlos' Famous Hat
effect:
When this armor enters play, put a 4 / 4 Coyote Spirit Monster ally token into play.

This armor can prevent damage that would be dealt to Coyote allies you control.
"I don't always wear hats, but when I do, they summon coyote spirits." - Don Carlos
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

name: Doom Commander Zaakuul
effect:
Monster Hero Required

When another non-token ally you control is destroyed, put a token copy of that ally into play that is also a Demon Monster.
One of the mightiest and most brutal doomguards in the service of Kil'jaeden.

name: Doomguard Soldier
effect: This ally has Assault 3 while you control another Demon.
"There's no mistaking the sound of those horrible wings - the sound of doom approaching." - Xander Blackcrow

name: Draka
effect:
Ferocity

While you have no cards in your hand, when Draka deals combat damage to a hero, put a 2 / 2 Orc Warrior ally token into play with Ferocity and "This ally can attack only heroes."
The daughter of Kelkar would one day be mother to Go'el, an orc with a great destiny.

name: Durnholde Tracking Hound
effect: At the start of your turn, target ally loses and can't have Elusive this turn.
The guards at Durnholde Keep kept those hounds to discourage escape attempts by imprisoned orcs.

name: Durotan
effect:
When Durotan enters play, discard your hand.

Durotan can protect Draka and Thrall allies you control.
The son of Garad was betrayed, cut down before his infant son Go'el could know him.

name: Durotan's Battle Harness
effect: At the start of your turn, you may add a +1 counter to this armor.
This is a legacy chest piece worn by Frostwolf chieftains for eleven generations.

name: Dwarf Demolitionist
effect: When this ally deals combat damage to a defending hero, you may destroy this ally. If you do, it deals 7 fire damage to that hero.
"Hey, you! Catch!"

name: Elistari Silverwind
effect:
Elusive

→ This ally deals 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.
"The wind doesn't touch one tree at a time. When it blows, the whole forest moves."

name: Enabrin, Timewalker Druid
effect: While you control two or more allies that share a or race: → Draw a card.
"My faith belongs to Elune; my heart belongs to Azeroth; my life belongs to the Timewalkers."

name: Enslaved Red Dragon
effect: While an opponent controls an hero, this ally has +2 ATK and Spellshield
Zuluhed and the Dragonmaw orc clan enslaved Alexstrasza the Life-Binder and her children during the Second War.

name: Eredar Deathbringer
effect: When another ally you control is destroyed, this ally heals 4 damage from your hero.
The eredar were once a peaceful race before succumbing to the dark promises and "gifts" of Sargeras.

name: Escape from Durnholde
effect:
Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one on top of your deck and the rest on the bottom.
"We will leave when you are ready." - Thrall

name: Ethereal Spellfilcher
effect: When this ally enters play, gain control of target ability. If it's attached, you may reattach it.

name: Ethereal Thief
effect: When this ally enters play, gain control of target armor or item.
"No hard feelings, friend - these artifacts need to fall into the right wrong hands."

name: Farseer Horgath
effect: Bloodrush: At the start of your turn, if an opposing hero has more damage on it than your hero, you may put this ally from your graveyard into your hand.
"The spirits show us possible futures - it's up to us to determine just how possible."

name: Fast-Acting Poison
effect:
Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character.
"I don't care exactly what it does, as long as it does it quickly." - Nazzik, Timewalker Trickster

name: Fel Inversion
effect: Target ally has +4 / -2 this turn.
"You think he looks goofy? YOU tell him that." - Myro Lumastis

name: Felguard Annihilator
effect: When this ally is destroyed, it deals 1 melee damage to target opposing hero or ally.
"This demon cares not for its own fate. It craves destruction above all else." - Elistari Silverwind

name: Feral Prowess
effect: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally, or 4 if that character is exhausted.
"Finding druids in cat form is easy. They're always right behind you." - Xander Blackcrow

name: Flame Volley
effect: Your hero deals 1 fire damage to each opposing ally.
"Fire: the indiscriminate element for those with discriminating tastes." - Lyra, Timewalker Embermage

name: Floating Spellbook
effect: Elusive, Spellshield
This rune-inscribed tome of spells seems to have a life of its own.

name: Fool's Bane
effect: You pay (1) more to play this weapon for each card in opposing hands.
A fool and his life are soon parted.

name: Fortified Defenses
effect:
Ongoing: Your hero has Protector.

While you control five or more allies:
→ Ready target hero or ally.
"Find inspiration in every life you strive to protect." - Lara, Timewalker Commander

name: Freezing Rain Totem
effect:
Ongoing: When this Totem enters play, it deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally.

At the start of your turn, this totem deals 2 frost damage to target opposing hero.

(Totems can't attack.)

name: Frost Stasis
effect:
Attach to target opposing ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack or exhaust.

When attached ally is dealt damage, destroy it and put three 2 / 1 Water Elemental ally tokens into play,
"Consider your assets frozen." - Jamir, Ethereal Arcanist

name: Frostwolf
effect: This and other allies you control have +1 ATK while attacking heroes and allies.
These fiercely loyal creatures are the symbol of the Frostwolf orc clan.

name: Furbolg Shaman
effect: When this ally enters play, if you have five or more cards in your graveyard, it may deal 5 nature damage to target hero.

name: Fury of the Ages
effect:
Rift

Protector

name: Gauntlets of the Ancient Frostwolf
effect: (2), → Target ally you control has +2 ATK and Smash this turn.
The Frostwolf clan continued practicing shamanism, free of demonic corruption, in Alterac Valley after the Second War.

name: General Turalyon
effect:
Protector

When Turalyon enters play, put a 4 / 4 Spirit ally token named Lothar into play with Ferocity and Lothar (1).

Turalyon has Invincible while you control an ally named Lothar.
"This world is ours, and by the Holy Light we will keep it safe, now and forever."

name: Ghostly Charger
effect:
If you placed a resource face up into your resource row this turn: → Target ally has Ferocity and Stealth this turn.

(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
These long-dead steeds haunt the stables of Karazhan.

name: Gnomish Flying Machine
effect:
Elusive

(1), → Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ally, other allies you control have +1 ATK this turn.
"Hello, sonny. Want me to fly?"

name: Goblin Sapper
effect: When this ally deals combat damage to a defending hero, you may destroy this ally. If you do, destroy target resource.
"Primed and ready!"

name: Greater Fleshbeast
effect: Medivh is gone, but the slavering, hungering creatures of his twisted nightmares still remain, forever stalking the gloomy shadows of Karazhan.

name: Grim Touch
effect:
Attach to target ally you control.

Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 1 for each card in opposing graveyards.

When attached ally attacks, target opponent puts the top three cards of his deck into his graveyard.
"I would say not to get on a death knight's bad side, but I'm not sure they have a good one." - Watsun, Timewalker Lightshield

name: Guardian of the Ages
effect:
Rift

Protector
"Faith - and the Light - transcend time." - Watsun, Timewalker Lightshield

name: Hand of Dread
effect: Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target ally for each card in that ally's controller's graveyard.
"Leave no gravestone unturned." - Korgen Skullcleaver

name: Hellscream Slicer
effect:
Dual Wield

When this weapon enters play, if an opponent controls an hero, add a +1 ATK counter to this and each other weapon you control.
Warsong chieftain Grom Hellscream was the first orc to drink Mannoroth's blood and the last orc to die by his hand.

name: Highland Lion
effect: This and other allies you control have +1 ATK while attacking heroes and allies.
Proud, noble, majestic: a perfect symbol for the Alliance.

name: Holy Word: Hope
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 .

When attached ally is dealt damage while defending, your hero heals 3 damage from itself.
"There will be a new day tomorrow. Of that you can be sure, as sure as the moon rises and falls." - Virendra Moonglow

name: Human Darkweaver
effect: Unity: When this ally enters play, if you control three or more Human allies, target opponent removes the top three cards of his deck from the game.

name: Human Footman
effect: "Awaiting orders."

name: Human Knight
effect:
Protector

Through dedication and conviction, a knight can come to harness the power of the Light.

name: Human Operative
effect: Unity: While you control three or more Human allies, this ally has Assault 2 and Stealth.
"Target acquired. Moving in."

name: Human Peasant
effect: When this ally enters play, you may turn a face up resource you control face down. If you do, this ally deals 1 melee damage to target hero or ally.
"More work? Righto."

name: Human Sniper
effect: Unity: When this ally enters play, if you control three or more Human allies, target ally you control has Long-Range this turn.
Human hunters pack military discipline in their quivers.

name: Intervening Shot
effect: Put target defending ally you control into its owner's hand. Your hero deals 5 ranged damage to target attacker.
"Hey, Big-and-Ugly!" - Xander Blackcrow

name: Karazhan Concubine
effect: When this ally enters play, you may exhaust target ally. If can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
"We could have so much fun!"

name: Khadgar
effect:
You pay (2) less to play abilities, to a minimum of (1).

When you play an ability, you may ready Khadgar.
"Your name means 'trust' in the old dwarven language. So I will hold you to your name, young Khadgar." - Medivh

name: Khadgar's Kilt of Abjuration
effect: (2), → Opposing allies lose and can't have powers this turn.
"When someone handles an item, they leave a part of their own magical aura attached to it." - Khadgar

name: Kil'rek
effect:
Elusive

→ Kil'rek deals 1 fire damage to target opposing hero for each demon you control.
"First time I've ever seen imps boss anybody around - even other imps." - Lyra, Timewalker Embermage

name: Korah Icefang
effect: When this ally enters play, double the ATK of target ally this turn.
"As a child in Nagrand, I had the winter frost for my enemy. Now it is my ally."

name: Korgen Skullcleaver
effect: Destroy another ally you control → Target Orc ally has Ferocity this turn.
"Fighting the Horde's battles slakes my bloodthirst ... for now."

name: Lady Voltaire
effect: Unity: While you control three or more Human allies, if another Human ally you control would be dealt damage, you may have it dealt to this ally instead.
"A family name is a small comfort for the dead - but a comfort, nonetheless."

name: Legacy of Betrayal
effect:
Remove target opposing ally and all opposing allies that share that ally's name from the game. Then search that ally's controller's deck, graveyard, and hand for all allies with that name and remove them from the game.

Ongoing: Destroy this ability → You may play one of the allies removed this way. (Pay costs as normal.)

name: Light of Dawn
effect:
Holy Talent

Attach to target ally, and your hero heals all damage from it. Add a holy counter to this ability for each damage healed this way.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1 for each holy counter on this ability.

Attached ally has Absorb.

name: Light's Vengeance
effect: This turn, target ally has +3 ATK, and damage it would deal is unpreventable.
Justice favors the righteous.

name: Living Seed
effect:
Restoration Talent

Attach to your hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, add a growth counter to this ability, and your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each growth counter. Then, if there are four or more growth counters on this ability, destroy it. If you do, put a 4 / 4 Ancient Monster ally token into play with Protector.

name: Loremaster Pooth
effect: When you complete a quest, you may put a 2 / 2 Worgen ally token into play.
Her studies turned up knowledge thought lost to the cycles of time.

name: Lothar's Edge
effect: When this weapon enters play, if an opponent controls a hero, you pay (3) less to strike with this weapon this turn.
As strong as its namesake.

name: Lyra, Timewalker Embermage
effect: Spellshield
"Living away from the forest lets you really enjoy using fire magic."

name: Magatha Grimtotem
effect:
Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, Magatha heals 5 damage from your hero.

Your hero has Assault 5 while it's undamaged.
Before Baine exiled her, Magatha Grimtotem supported the Horde - for her own reasons.

name: Magma Blast
effect: Choose one: Your hero deals 1 fire damage to target ally; or your hero deals 3 fire damage to target hero.
"And you thought getting hit by a solid rock was bad." - Farseer Horgath

name: Makuna Hatada
effect: (5) → This and other allies you control have +5 ATK, Absorb, and Smash this turn.
Loosely translated from Taur'ahe, it means "without worry."

name: Mantle of Abrahmis
effect: When another armor or weapon enters play under your control, choose one: Add a +1 ATK counter to target weapon you control; or add a +1 counter to target armor you control.
"I feel like a tank in these things." - Lara, Timewalker Commander

name: Medivh's Journal
effect:
Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Look at target player's hand.
"I need to ask a special favor of you. As part of our research, the Violet Eye has been tracking down Medivh's own journal." - Archmage Alturus

name: Millennium Blade
effect:
Dual Wield

While you control another weapon, this weapon has +1 ATK, and you pay (1) less to strike with it.
Guaranteed to strike just in the nick of time.

name: More Work?
effect: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Moro, Timewalker Druid
effect:
Protector

While you control two or more allies that share a or race, this ally has Sentinel.
"I stand ready to uphold the Timewalker vow."

name: Moroes
effect: Stealth, Spellshield

name: Moroes' Lucky Pocket Watch
effect: (2), → Reveal the top card of your deck. The next time your hero would be dealt damage this turn, prevent damage equal to the cost of the revealed card.
"Time ... Never enough time." - Moroes

name: Myro Lumastis
effect:
Unity: When this ally enters play, if you control three or more Human allies, remove target opposing ally from the game.

When this ally leaves play, the owner of that removed ally puts that ally into play.
"We'll deal with you later."

name: Nazzik, Timewalker Trickster
effect:
Stealth

When this ally deals combat damage to a defending hero, choose one: that hero's controller chooses and discards a card; or you draw a card.

"Gangway, pal!"

name: Nehru, Timewalker Hunter
effect: While you control two or more allies that share a or race: (2) → This ally has Assault 2 this turn.
"Winds of time, make my aim true this day."

name: Night Elf Arcanist
effect: Haste 3
"I arrive precisely when I mean to."

name: Night Elf Bladedancer
effect:
Haste 2

Elusive
"I'm as swift as the forest wind and just as untouchable."

name: Night Elf Grovewalker
effect: Spellshield

name: Night Elf Moon Priestess
effect: "As with the moon, you may not always see Elune's power in the daylight, but it's always there."

name: Night Elf Ranger
effect: Assault 2

name: Night Elf Swiftblade
effect: Haste 2
"Be quick, be silent, be deadly."

name: Nightbane
effect: When Nightbane enters play, he deals 10 fire damage divided as you choose to any number of target opposing heroes and/or allies.
In his madness, Medivh slew the mighty Arcanagos of the Blue Dragonflight. His reanimated bones haunt the mage's tower.

name: No Mercy
effect:
As an additional cost to play, remove up to five abilities in your graveyard from the game.

Destroy all opposing allies and equipment with cost less than or equal to the number of abilities removed this way.

name: Orc Blackblade
effect: Bloodrush: When this ally enters play, if an opposing hero has more damage on it than your hero, target opponent chooses and discards a card.

name: Orc Flamecaller
effect: "Burn it to the ground? Feh. Why stop there?"

name: Orc Grunt
effect: Bloodrush: While an opposing hero has more damage on it than your hero, this ally has Ferocity.
"Dabu."

name: Orc Necrolyte
effect: When this ally enters play, it deals 2 shadow damage to target opposing hero and heals 2 damage from your hero.
"Gul'dan's weakness was in his ego, not his area of study."

name: Orc Peon
effect: When this ally enters play, you may turn a face up resource you control face down. If you do, target ally has +2 ATK this turn.
"Zug zug."

name: Orgrim Doomhammer
effect: When Orgrim deals combat damage to a hero, that hero's controller chooses and destroys a card he controls for each damage dealt.

effect:
Marksmanship Talent

name: Power Word: Spirit
effect:
Attach to target ally you control.

Ongoing: When attached ally deals combat damage to a hero, put a 2 / 2 Spirit ally token into play with Absorb.

name: Prayer of the Ages
effect:
Rift

Put target ally from your graveyard into play.

effect: At the start of your turn, reveal the top card of your deck. If its cost is odd, you may play it without paying its cost. Otherwise, put a 6 / 6 Infernal Demon Monster ally token into play.

name: Psychic Horror
effect:
Shadow Talent

Target up to one each of an opposing ability, ally, and equipment, and put those cards into their owners' hands.

effect:
Rift

Ongoing: Allies you control have +3 / +3.
"Taking on the form of these animals means bearing the burden of their rage as well." - Moro, Timewalker Druid

name: Royal Crest of Lordaeron
effect:
Your hero has Protector.

At the start of your turn, add a +1 counter to this armor for each ally you control.

Your hero has Assault 10 while this armor has 10 or more .
The kingdom has fallen, but the symbol remains.

name: Secrets of the Ages
effect:
Rift

Put a token copy of target ally you control into play.
"Call me Medivh for now. I also answer to 'Keeper of Secrets' and other names, not all known." - Medivh

name: Servant of Terestian
effect: Elusive
Satyr warlock Terestian Illhoof, occupying Karazhan's secret library, uses these imps in his dark rituals.

name: Shade of Aran
effect:
Monster Hero Required

As Aran enters play and as your turn starts, you may choose another ally. If you do, Aran has all powers of the chosen ally until the start of your next turn.
"Yes, yes, my son Medivh is quite powerful ... but I have powers of my own!"

name: Shadowmoon Mage
effect: "You die in name of Ner'zhul!"

name: Shard of the Virtuous
effect:
At the start of your turn, your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each ally you control.

This weapon has +3 ATK while your hero is undamaged.
Reserved for the pure of heart.

name: Shivarra Deathspeaker
effect: When this ally enters play, she may deal 3 fire damage to target hero with 15 or more damage on it.

name: Sigil of the Legion
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1, or +2 / +2 if its a Demon.
This fel magical sigil empowers the demonic followers of Sargeras in their Burning Crusade.

name: Snappyfin
effect: Murloc allies in your hand are .
"MGGMLGLGM MGGM MRMLRLG!"

name: Soul Pox
effect:
Attach to target opposing hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero.

When an opposing ally is destroyed, your hero heals 1 damage from itself.

name: Spawn of Hyakiss
effect: Spellshield
Good luck swatting this one away.

name: Spawn of Rokad
effect: When this ally enters play, if an opponent controls an ally with 6 or more, this ally has +4 ATK and Ferocity this turn.
Medivh's cellar is home to many strange and dangerous creatures.

name: Spawn of Shadikith
effect: (4) → Exhaust all opposing heroes and allies.
Its ear-splitting screech is enough to bring you to your knees.

name: Staff of Infinite Mysteries
effect: (4), , Destroy this weapon → Search target opponent's deck for a card, then that opponent names a card. If you searched for the named card, that opponent puts it into his hand. Otherwise, remove that card from the game, and you may play that card without paying its cost.

name: Static Shock
effect:
Enhancement Talent

Attach to target ally or weapon you control.

Ongoing: When attached card exhausts, add a static counter to this ability.

Attached card has +1 ATK for each static counter on this ability.

When attached card is destroyed, your hero deals 1 nature damage to target opposing hero for each static counter on this ability.

name: Storm of the Ages
effect:
Rift

Your hero deals X nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.
"Storm of the century? I can beat that." - Zor'ka, Timewalker Shaman

name: Taretha's Diversion
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Turn target opposing face-up resource face down. If it was a location, you may draw a card.
"You are friends of Taretha? So this is her new plan? Very well then ..." - Thrall

name: Tauren Deathwalker
effect: "I hear the cries of our ancestors, for I walk between worlds, between lives."

name: Tauren Lightcaller
effect: Absorb
"May the light of the sun always guide your path."

name: Tauren Mystic
effect: Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, this ally deals 1 nature damage to target hero and heals 1 damage from your hero.
"With the power of the elements and the blessing of our ancestors, I will defend the tribe with my life."

name: Tauren Plainsrider
effect: Long-Range
"Faster, old friend. We've quarry to catch."

name: Tauren Sunhoof
effect: Protector
"In the name of An'she and his eternal light, I will do all that I can to keep you safe."

name: Tauren Tracker
effect: When this ally attacks, he deals 1 ranged damage to target opposing hero.
"From the mesas, we see all."

name: Tauren Wildmender
effect: When this ally enters play, she heals 3 damage from your hero.

name: Terestian Illhoof
effect:
When this ally enters play, Portal.

At the end of your turn, you may destroy another Demon ally you control. If you do, Terestian deals shadow damage to target opposing hero or ally equal to the cost of that destroyed Demon.

name: Thane Kurdran Wildhammer
effect:
Protector

When Kurdran enters play, put a 0 / 1 Egg ally token into play.

At the start of your turn, target Egg ally you control becomes a 6 / 6 Gryphon Beast Monster ally named Sky'ree with Sky'ree (1).
Kurdran and his loyal gryphon Sky'ree accompanied Danath Trollbane and other Alliance heroes to seal the Dark Portal on Draenor.

name: The Big Bad Wolf
effect:
When Big Bad enters play, target opposing ally can't attack or exhaust, loses and can't have powers, and becomes 0 / 5 until Big Bad leaves play. Big Bad must attack that ally if able.

When Big Bad deals fatal combat damage to that ally, he has +5 / +5 and Invincible.
"Run away, little girl! Run away ..."

name: The Black Morass
effect:
If you played a non-Ongoing ability this turn: Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"The Infinite Dragonflight plot to destroy the guardian, Medivh, and prevent the Dark Portal from ever opening." - Andormu

name: The Fall of Lordaeron
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: allies you control have +1 ATK this turn.
The proud, defiant armies of the Alliance stand resolute in their final, fleeting moments.

name: The Master's Touch
effect:
Pay (4) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
"That key, I recognize it. That is Khadgar's key ... of course I haven't given it to him yet." - Medivh

name: The Opening of the Dark Portal
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Choose a or race, then reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally of the chosen race into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"Beyond this timeway, the Guardian, Medivh, feverishly works to open the Dark Portal." - Sa'at

name: Thoglos
effect:
This ally can protect your hero.

When this ally is dealt fatal damage, he heals 5 damage from your hero.
"When I consume your world, my armies will save you for last."

name: Thorns of Nordrassil
effect:
Attach to target hero or ally.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character, or 2 if you control another Ongoing ability.

name: Time-Bending Gem
effect: When you place a resource face up into your resource row, your hero has Assault 1 this turn.
Time seems to warp and twist around this ring.
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior

name: Time-Shifted Dagger
effect: When this weapon enters play, switch the ATK and of target ally this turn.
"When I said I wanted to rearrange your face, that's not quite what I meant ..." - Nazzik, TImewalker Trickster

name: Timeless Agony
effect:
Echo

Target opponent removes the top three cards of his deck from the game.
"A moment of pleasure is fleeting. A moment of pain feels like an eternity." - Dohna Darksky

name: Timeless Aim
effect:
Echo

Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to target hero or ally.
"No need to be hasty when tracking a target. You have all the time in the world in that brief moment." - Elistari Silverwind

name: Timeless Arcana
effect:
Echo

Draw a card.
"You can find latent arcane energy nearly anywhere, just lazing about unattended. Attend it." - Bianca, Timewalker Mage

name: Timeless Bounty
effect:
Echo

Put two 1 / 1 Treant ally tokens into play.
"I'm comforted by nature's embrace, no matter the era I walk in." - Enabrin, Timewalker Druid

name: Timeless Deception
effect:
Echo

Target opponent chooses and discards a card.
"A moment of stupidity can leave a lifetime of regret in its wake. Or no lifetime at all." - Belthira the Black Thorn

name: Timeless Light
effect:
Echo

Your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.
"Light mend your wounds and keep you from further harm."

name: Timeless Resilience
effect:
Echo

Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.
"For the Horde! For all time!"

name: Timeless Shadow
effect:
Echo

Target opponent chooses an ally he controls and puts it into its owner's hand.
"Search for power in the places behind your soul where the Light cannot reach." - Drom'kor, Timewalker Necrolyte

name: Timeless Undeath
effect:
Echo

Put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play.
"Throughout history there is one thing you'll find no shortage of, and that's dead bodies." - Lady Voltaire

name: Timeless Winds
effect:
Echo

Target ally or weapon has +2 ATK this turn.
"Spirits of the wind, lift our weary bodies that we may see another day!" - Farseer Horgath

name: Timewalker Juggernaut
effect: When this ally enters play, if you control two or more allies that share a or race, you may destroy target damaged ally.
"Out of the way, runt."

name: Timewalker Shadowseer
effect: When this ally enters play, if you control two or more allies that share a or race, allies you control have Absorb this turn.
"Let the eternal shadow feed your hunger and slake your thirst."

name: Timewalker Smasher
effect: When this ally enters play, if you control two or more allies that share a or race, target ally you control has +4 ATK and Smash this turn.
"Just point me to the right era, boss."

name: Timewalker Vanguard
effect: When this ally enters play, if you control two or more allies that share a or race, this ally deals 3 melee damage to target hero.
"To protect our causes throughout time is my honor and my duty."

name: Troll Axethrower
effect:
Ferocity

This ally has +1 ATK for each damage on it.
"What you wan' me kill?"

name: Vagaries of Time
effect: (3), → Reveal the top card of your deck. You may place it into your resource row exhausted as an additional resource.
The clock ticks down, but to what?

name: VanCleef's Boots
effect:
When this armor enters play, choose "Demon," a race, or an race.

→ Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally of the chosen race into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
The boots that tried to trample a kingdom underfoot.

name: Venomous Wounds
effect:
Assassination Talent

Ongoing: At the end of your turn, if your hero dealt combat damage to a hero this turn, trigger each Poison you control.
"Yeah, I know it's overkill! That's the point!" - Nazzik, Timewalker Trickster

name: Vile Watcher
effect: When this ally enters play, you may look at the top card of each opponent's deck.
Escaping its gaze is mathematically unlikely.

name: Virendra Moonglow
effect:
Haste 2

When this ally enters play, if you control another Night Elf ally, you may destroy target ability.
"You know, it really isn't darkest just before dawn. I don't know why people say that."

name: Voidshrieker
effect: Protector
What exactly necessitates the voidshrieker's hood is a question that still plagues scholars.

name: Warglaive of Azzinoth
effect:
Dual Wield

When your hero deals combat damage with this weapon to a hero, put a 3 / 3 Demon Monster ally token into play named Flame of Azzinoth.

At the start of your turn, if you control two or more allies named Flame of Azzinoth, this weapon has +10 ATK this turn.
"Curious weapons you wield ... such power." - Illidan Stormrage

name: Watsun, Timewalker Lightshield
effect:
Protector

At the start of your turn, choose one: this ally heals damage from your hero equal to this ally's ATK; or this ally deals unpreventable holy damage to target hero equal to this ally's ATK.

If you control two or more allies that share a or race, you may choose both.
"Protecting the timeways can challenge even the bravest hero."

name: Wildhammer Gryphon
effect: While an opponent controls a hero, this ally has +2 ATK and Elusive.
Half of this beast is endangered, but the other half IS danger.

name: Windrunner's Bow
effect: While your hero has 5 or less remaining health, double the ATK of this weapon, and it has Long-Range.
Wielded by the time-twisted Echo of Sylvanas.

name: Wrath of the Ages
effect:
Rift

This turn, double the ATK of target ally, and it has Smash.
"Wrath is an ancient force, something primeval that we're cursed and blessed to periodically unleash." - Xander Blackcrow

name: Wrathguard Defender
effect: Protector
"I find myself thankful that I never encountered these demons during the Third War." - Farseer Horgath

name: Xander Blackcrow
effect:
When this ally enters play, put two 1 / 1 Human Warrior tokens into play with Protector.

This ally has +1 / +1 for each other Human ally you control.
"All I need is an opening."

name: Zafira Ragebolt
effect: When this ally enters play, you may ready a resource you control for this and each other Orc ally you control.

name: Zor'ka, Timewalker Shaman
effect: While you control two or more allies that share a or race: → This ally deals 2 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.
"I will keep watch over the Horde's history to ensure none of its lessons are ever forgotten."

name: Zul'jin
effect:
Stealth

Zul'jin has +1 ATK for each damage on him.

Once per turn: Put 1 damage on Zul'jin → Ready Zul'jin.
"We Amani was here before anyone! Da elves and dere Alliance came to drive us out. But we never give up. We never forget ..."
